titleInfo.title: The influence of top-down expectations on the perception of syllable prominence

mods.abstract:
In our study we use the experimental framework of priming to manipulate our subjects‘ expectations of syllable prominence in sentences with a well-defined syntactic and phonological structure. It shows that it is possible to prime prominence patterns and that priming leads to significant differences in the judgment of syllable promi- nence.
Key words: Top-Down, Priming, Syllable Prominence, Perception
